name: Venafi TLS Protect Cloud
semantic_context: Consume Venafi TLS Protect Cloud API
natural_language_description: 这是 Venafi TLS Protect Cloud 节点。主要用于: Consume Venafi TLS Protect Cloud API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: certificateRequest

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new certificate request
Get (值: get) - Retrieve a certificate request
Get Many (值: getMany) - Retrieve many certificate requests

certificateId.name: certificateId
certificateId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Certificate ID | (必填项)

downloadItem.name: downloadItem
downloadItem.natural_language_description: 参数名: Download Item | 默认值: certificate

keystoreType.name: keystoreType
keystoreType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Keystore Type | 默认值: PEM

certificateLabel.name: certificateLabel
certificateLabel.natural_language_description: 参数名: Certificate Label | (必填项)

privateKeyPassphrase.name: privateKeyPassphrase
privateKeyPassphrase.natural_language_description: 参数名: Private Key Passphrase | (必填项)

keystorePassphrase.name: keystorePassphrase
keystorePassphrase.natural_language_description: 参数名: Keystore Passphrase | (必填项)

binaryProperty.name: binaryProperty
binaryProperty.description: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be uploaded
binaryProperty.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Data Field Name | 作用: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be uploaded | 默认值: data | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: validityPeriod (值: None) - Specify how long the issued certificate should be valid for. Use ISO8601 format.

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}

applicationId.name: applicationId
applicationId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
applicationId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Application Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

certificateIssuingTemplateId.displayName: Certificate Issuing Template Name or ID
certificateIssuingTemplateId.name: certificateIssuingTemplateId
certificateIssuingTemplateId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
certificateIssuingTemplateId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Certificate Issuing Template Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

generateCsr.name: generateCsr
generateCsr.natural_language_description: 参数名: Generate CSR | 默认值: False

commonName.name: commonName
commonName.description: The Common Name field for the certificate Subject (CN)
commonName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Common Name | 作用: The Common Name field for the certificate Subject (CN) | 默认值: n8n.io | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: keyType (值: None) - The encryption algorithm for the public key
keyLength (值: None) - The number of bits to allow for key generation
organization (值: None) - The name of a company or organization
organizationalUnits (值: None) - The name of a department or section
locality (值: None) - The name of a city or town
state (值: None) - The name of a state or province
country (值: None) - A 2 letter country code

certificateRequestId.name: certificateRequestId
certificateRequestId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Certificate Request ID | (必填项)
